home.title: Home | Pornchai's Portfolio
home.subTitle: Front-end Developer
home.bachelor: Bachelor's Degree in Application Design and Development
home.introText:
A graduate of EFREI Paris, I am currently seeking a front-end developer position in Grenoble. Passionate about the web since the age of 15, I design fluid and aesthetic interfaces that optimize user experience.

Journey & Skills
During my training at EFREI Paris, I developed strong autonomy and quick adaptability. This school encourages self-learning from the first year, reinforcing my pre-existing passion for continuous learning.

My expertise has been built through various client projects:
• Creation of showcase websites for restaurants
• Development of iOS and Android mobile applications
• Design and management of databases with advanced search systems
• And many other custom projects

Professional Approach
I fully invest in each project with a structured approach:
• In-depth discussions to understand needs
• Precise definition of challenges
• Development with regular follow-ups
• Professional delivery and installation

Calm and collaborative by nature, I easily adapt to new technologies and methodologies to effectively tackle technical challenges.

Professional Goal
My ambition is to deliver quality code and creative solutions to ambitious projects. If you're looking for a motivated profile to join your team, I'd be delighted to discuss your needs and my potential contribution.

Feel free to contact me for any additional information.

about.title: About Me
about.bioText:
Born in Thailand, my journey has been shaped by events that forged my resilience and determination. I experienced the 2004 tsunami, an event that profoundly influenced my outlook on life. Following this, my family and I moved to France, where I began integrating into a new culture.

A few years later, I returned to Thailand to complete my high school diploma, reconnecting with my roots while maintaining an international perspective. This dual culture has given me a unique outlook and motivated me to return to France for higher education at EFREI Paris, where I developed my passion for web development and interface design.

Today, as a front-end developer, I combine technical rigor and creative sensitivity, influenced by my unique multicultural background.
about.formationEfreiText: Engineering degree in computer science, specializing in web development and front-end technologies.
about.formationLycéeText: Scientific high school diploma with honors, engineering sciences option.
frontendTechList: React.js - Creation of dynamic and interactive user interfaces
Next.js - Development of React applications with server-side rendering
SCSS/Sass - Advanced styling with variables, mixins, and nested structures
CSS Animations - Design of lively interfaces with smooth animations
JavaScript ES6+ - Advanced DOM manipulation and asynchronous programming
about.responsiveText: I design every interface with a "mobile-first" philosophy, ensuring an optimal user experience across all devices. My responsive design approach is based on:
responsiveList: Use of flexible and adaptive grids
Optimized images and content for various resolutions
Rigorous testing across multiple devices and browsers
about.uiuxText: My interface design revolves around fundamental principles:
uiuxList: Clear visual hierarchy to guide the user
Careful spacing and typography for optimal readability
Harmonious and consistent color palettes aligned with brand identity

project.title: Projects
project.standardDescription: A complete e-commerce platform for a standard restaurant, offering a smooth user experience and efficient online order management.
project.standardFeature1: Creation of a secure order funnel
project.villaDescription: An elegant showcase website for a luxury villa, integrating booking systems for a comprehensive client experience.
project.villaFeature3: Developed solo with React and Vite
project.taverneDescription: Complete redesign of a website for a design studio, focusing on user experience and performance.
project.taverneFeature2: Integration of Swiper for smooth transitions
